div.p: What is the impact of social networks on relationships?
Nowadays, the internet is a part of our daily life. But it doesn't mean that it has only advantages. Knowing lots of people doesn't mean you are close to them.
On the social networks we can have niew friends with one click and it is easy to meet the all world. We can keep in touch with people that are on the other side of the world.

But we are hiding behind a screen and we can lie about our real personality and who we really are. Social networks can lead to an isolated behaviour because in real life we can't lie about who we really are and it is harder for some people to tell the thruth.

Social networks can also have benefits for shy or busy people if they are afraid of meeting people or if they don't have the time to. It gives you the opportunity to meet other people than your colleagues or your family.

I think that knowing too many people doesn't mean you are close to them. It is better to have a few friends but really knowing them. The internet can help to keep in touch but not to know other people. The best way is to meet them in real life.
